trailingComments.value:
*
 * Create a pointwise function
 * 
 * @export
 * @param {Function} fun
 * @returns {Function}
 * @example 
 * 
 * function _inc (x) {
 *   return x + 1
 * }
 * const inc = pointwise(inc)
 * inc(1)                                  // 2
 * inc([1, 2])                             // [2, 3]
 * inc([[1, 2], [1, 3]])                   // [[2, 3], [2, 4]]
 * 
 * 
 * function _add (x, y) {
 *   return x + y
 * }
 * const add = pointwise(_add)
 * add(1, 2)                                // 3
 * add([1, 2], [1, 2])                      // [2, 4]
 * add([[1, 2], [1, 2]], [[1, 2], [1, 2]])  //[[2, 4], [2, 4]]
throw new Error('mathlab: size of two matrices should be the same')

leadingComments.value: throw new Error('mathlab: size of two matrices should be the same')

*
 * Create a pointwise function
 * 
 * @export
 * @param {Function} fun
 * @returns {Function}
 * @example 
 * 
 * function _inc (x) {
 *   return x + 1
 * }
 * const inc = pointwise(inc)
 * inc(1)                                  // 2
 * inc([1, 2])                             // [2, 3]
 * inc([[1, 2], [1, 3]])                   // [[2, 3], [2, 4]]
 * 
 * 
 * function _add (x, y) {
 *   return x + y
 * }
 * const add = pointwise(_add)
 * add(1, 2)                                // 3
 * add([1, 2], [1, 2])                      // [2, 4]
 * add([[1, 2], [1, 2]], [[1, 2], [1, 2]])  //[[2, 4], [2, 4]]

*
 * Create a pointwise function
 * 
 * @export
 * @param {Function} fun

 * 
 * function _inc (x) {
 *   return x + 1
 * }
 * const inc = pointwise(inc)
 * inc(1)                                  // 2

 * inc([[1, 2], [1, 3]])                   // [[2, 3], [2, 4]]
 * 
 * 
 * function _add (x, y) {
 *   return x + y
 * }
 * const add = pointwise(_add)
 * add(1, 2)                                // 3
 * add([1, 2], [1, 2])                      // [2, 4]
 * add([[1, 2], [1, 2]], [[1, 2], [1, 2]])  //[[2, 4], [2, 4]]

comments.value:
*
 * Create a pointwise function
 * 
 * @export
 * @param {Function} fun
 * @returns {Function}
 * @example 
 * 
 * function _inc (x) {
 *   return x + 1
 * }
 * const inc = pointwise(inc)
 * inc(1)                                  // 2
 * inc([1, 2])                             // [2, 3]
 * inc([[1, 2], [1, 3]])                   // [[2, 3], [2, 4]]
 * 
 * 
 * function _add (x, y) {
 *   return x + y
 * }
 * const add = pointwise(_add)
 * add(1, 2)                                // 3
 * add([1, 2], [1, 2])                      // [2, 4]
 * add([[1, 2], [1, 2]], [[1, 2], [1, 2]])  //[[2, 4], [2, 4]]
throw new Error('mathlab: size of two matrices should be the same')
